model_info.description: Llama 3.2 3B Instruct Turbo is a lightweight, efficient chat/instruct model developed by Meta and hosted on Together AI. With 3 billion parameters, it is optimized for real-time applications through FP8 quantization, offering a 128K token context window and high output speed (131.7 tokens/second). It supports multiple languages and multimodal capabilities, including image and audio processing, while prioritizing cost-effective deployment.
use_cases: Content generation (blog posts, social media, creative writing)
Gaming NPC dialogue and interactive storytelling
IoT voice assistants and smart home integration
strengths: High output speed of 131.7 tokens/second for real-time applications
FP8 quantization reduces memory usage by 50% while maintaining performance
Large 128K token context window for handling extended inputs
Supports multimodal inputs (text, images, audio) for diverse use cases
Cost-efficient deployment with serverless and batch processing options
MMLU benchmark score of 63.4% for strong general knowledge
limitations: 3B parameter size may limit complex reasoning compared to larger models
128K context window insufficient for extremely long documents
FP8 quantization may introduce minor quality trade-offs for speed
